sentences.sContent: Combine all the ingredients in a large bowl.
sentences.sCn: 把所有食材都放在一个大碗里。

sentences.sContent: The food is home-cooked using fresh ingredients.
sentences.sCn: 这种食物是用新鲜的食材在家里烹制的。

sentences.sContent: Acetic acid is the chief active ingredient in vinegar.
sentences.sCn: 醋酸是醋的主要有效成分。

remMethod.val: in (进入) + gred (看作grad， 走) + ient → 走进， 使成为一部分 → 组成部分

trans.tranOther: one of the foods that you use to make a particular food or dish
